website_summaries.verdict: Gets high marks as a mild-flavored cooking or salad oil, although you can also use it externally.
pros: Primarily for cooking, but can also be used for skin and hair
cons: Some feel that this oil has no odor, taste, or color and that it is too refined or processed

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this oil
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this oil, tastes great and is great for you. Absolutely HATE this Amazon price!! For some reason I thought paying this amount was probably in line for the quality of this oil as reported (almost 28 bucks on Amazon), little did I know a major outlet store (begins with "C" and ends in "O"), sells the same oil- same exact brand and size (33 ounce), for just over 9 bucks!!! My bad, at least I know where to go next time though, and I will absolutely buy again, only from you-know-who next time...
customer_reviews.author: D. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: #1 Fat Source In My Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Four reasons I love this oil: - Great lipid profile (like olive oil, unlike coconut oil) - Works for med-high heat (like coconut oil, but unlike olive oil) - Neutral taste (unlike either) - Works well in both Western and Eastern cooking - Non-GMO
customer_reviews.author: G. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Love this.. have drunk probably 9 bottles in 2018.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this oil, tastes great and is great for you. I put 2 to 4 spoonsful in my coffee every morning. Absolutely HATE this Amazon price!! For some reason I thought paying this amount was probably in line for the quality of this oil as reported (almost 28 bucks on Amazon), little did I know a major outlet store (begins with "C" and ends in "O"), sells the same oil- same exact brand and size (33 ounce), for just over 9 bucks!!! My bad, at least I know where to go next time though, and I will absolutely buy again, only from you-know-who next time...
customer_reviews.author: John Vault

customer_reviews.title: This is a great all-around oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all-around oil, both for cooking as it has a high flash point, but also for salad dressings, mayo and baking. I first found it at costco, but it comes and goes there. This is the best deal I've found, and I got it in 2 days. Well-wrapped in bubble wrap in a box within a box. It's going on my reorder list.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S

customer_reviews.title: Awful would give zero stars if possible
customer_reviews.text: This oil does not have a high heat standard. I tried sautéed onions and peppers with this avacacado oil versus a brand I’ve used in the past. There is no comparison this oil produced smoke at low heat and a god awful taste. If you want to try it do so at your own risk because it is non refundable. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nuke Tech.

customer_reviews.title: Check your grocery store
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. But I was seriously pissed off when I saw this on the shelf of my local Kroger for $12. I mean come on this price gouging is getting ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Fool

customer_reviews.title: IT SMOKES!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product smokes at a much lower heat 500 degrees (per the bottle). My entire house stinks and I was sick by the smoke. Very disappointed. Sadly I am unable to return this item after using 1 Tbsp.
customer_reviews.author: Jain Stone

customer_reviews.title: Smokes too easily
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had issues with this oil smoking heavily at low temperatures. Not convinced it was 100% avocado oil and not diluted with canola oil or some other low smoke point oil.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great oil, tastes good, slightly lower smoke point than I hoped but still high in general
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking the Avocado oil. I don't know how people with low reviews get rotten whatever flavor. It does have a very slight unique taste to it but mostly it just taste like oil... like any other oil. Seems fresh, mild, cooks well. I knocked off a star just because it's smoking for me at a ways under 500 degrees. Still higher than most my oils, but I'll probably still be using my refined rice bran oil for stir fry in my wok since it gets to almost 600 degrees before it smokes (I used a laser thermometer).
customer_reviews.author: TheGuy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t taste right and can’t be returned
customer_reviews.text: Tastes terrible. Nothing like other bottles of avocado oil I’ve used before. Amazon does not permit returns or refunds so stay away from this one. Not worth the risk.
customer_reviews.author: JR0

customer_reviews.title: defective package was leaking
customer_reviews.text: I would have exchanged this item but Amazon would not allow it so I am giving the lowest grade I can. I will not consume food products that are not correctly sealed. This doesn't happen often but it really ticks me off when I have to toss out $20 worth of stuff even though it carried PRIME designation. Furthermore, it made the other item in the box covered in oil. What a cluster. Now I have to clean up an oil slick in my home....
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati Jake

customer_reviews.title: BEST AVOCADO OIL
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely best avocado out there. Cold pressed. I was a bit worried about the glass bottles surviving the transport, but Shipping dept did a wonderful job making sure they were well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Reader1969

customer_reviews.title: bought by mistake, and I'm glad :)
customer_reviews.text: I meant to order Olive Oil, but clicked on this Avocado Oil, by mistake, clicked the order button, received this item, and I really like this stuff! nice size bottle for the money, and it cooks up everything, perfectly. I used it to fry some potatoes (since I had this healthy oil, thought I'd do that) they came out evenly browned, and with the best taste! I'll keep using this, even though I ordered some OO.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Kay

customer_reviews.title: Next best choice if you cannot find Avohaas
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used Avohaas but it’s been increasingly difficult to find, and is now astronomically priced, so I’ve switched to Chosen Foods and it’s now my new favorite. It’s a nice flavor, I use it on salads, high heat cooking such as stirfry‘s, even grilling. Definitely recommend this product. However the last one I ordered was an expired bottle so please be aware that you cannot return this item if that happens to you, you actually have to call Amazon and let them know what happened, and they will make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Julie and Ben Parris

customer_reviews.title: Neutral flavor
customer_reviews.text: I normally purchase this at my local grocery store but it’s cheaper on Amazon. I was honestly worried it would be leaking or broken but as you can see in the image, the packaging is amazing and the bottle was in perfect condition. As for the oil, I have tried several brands and this is by far my favorite, it has a neutral flavor and can be used at high temps and I even bake with it. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Smells like burnt/roasted avocado
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bottle of this at a store and I loved it. No smell of burnt avocado. When I ran out I went back to the store and they were out. Sales people said they weren't sure they would still carry this so I bought a bottle of their store brand and was disappointed. Avocado oil is usually recommended for higher temperature cooking but the store brand oil smelled like burnt avocado when heated up. So I decided to look for Chosen Foods avocado oil and happily found it on Amazon. But alas, somehow this smells just like the cheap store brand when heated. I'm afraid to buy this brand again. They must have quality control problems.
customer_reviews.author: Terry B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil, Price too high!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this "Chosen Foods" oil earlier today from Amazon since my cholesterol is very high. I occasionally will have fried food so wanted to eat healthy. I saw the same brand oil later today at Walmart for half the price and decided to purchase another bottle. Stir fried some chicken, mushrooms, bell peppers and onions and made a salad using this oil and vinegar - delicious!. Very good oil, will stock up on it in case the price goes up!
customer_reviews.author: carmlap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cooking oil
customer_reviews.text: This is really great cooking oil. It has practically no flavor so it doesn't add any oily taste, a very high smoke point so it doesn't burn when using in high heat cooking, and of all of the vegetable oils, this is one of the healthiest. Yes sometimes you want the flavor of olive oil, but not always. This is for all the other oil needs
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Lee

customer_reviews.title: NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: I inadvertently clicked 1 liter 6 bottles and asked for return information while the case was still in transit and Chosen Foods refused to take it back. I live alone and now have more avocado oil than I will use in my lifetime. Poor order page design and no return policy on this fairly pricey product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mott

customer_reviews.title: Will be repurchasing
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy avocados but don't LOVE them so when avocado oil was suggested by my nutritionist to try as salad dressing I wasn't sure what I would be getting but wanted to make sure I invested in a quality oil. First, I love the packaging the bottle arrived in. Very well sealed and protected. Second, I now regularly use this frequently as a replacement for olive oil. It has a higher smoke point and has a much milder flavor than most oils. Happily surprised. Will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Marie & Kenneth, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Olive oil
customer_reviews.text: I started using this (Avacado Oil) because I needed something with high heat tolerance (500) degree. This also lasts longer than olive oil does. It doesnt replace the rich distinct flavor of olive oil, which I love, but it is a great alternative, with less flavor. It is a clean flavor and I use it for almost everything
customer_reviews.author: young homesteader

customer_reviews.title: Super high smoke point, light, versatile
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I live in an apartment with no access to any outdoor cooking, like a grill. It has the highest smoke point of any oil I’ve been able to find. As such, it’s PERFECT for high temperature cooking and searing on my gas range top. There is hardly any smoke even when I use full power on my cast iron skillet (550+ degrees) for cooking a thick steak! There’s not much flavor in the oil, but that’s exactly what it’s supposed to be. It’s a very light and versatile oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avocado Oil in a Glass Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Chosen Foods Avocado Oil for several years. In the past I purchased from Costco, however, just a few weeks ago I went and they only offered one brand of Avocado Oil and it was in plastic. I prefer my food items in glass, not plastic. I find the Chosen Foods brand does exactly what I need, I use it for all my sauteing/pan frying and have even used it for baking with great results. Love that avocado oil has a high heat threshold.
customer_reviews.author: LA Chickee

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin & hair!
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil to make my own skin moisturizer with different essential oils & my skin looks & feels great since using it! Also, I have dry, curly hair & I use this almost daily on my hair & it makes it silky & moisturized. I haven’t used it for cooking yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: No fragrance, no taste, nice appearance and consistency. Good for when you need heat past the smoking point for olive oil. At medium high heat, this will hit its smoking point too if the surface area is not well-covered with heat-absorbing food (like when making pancakes), but I don't know what healthy oil would go any higher.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett Barouch

customer_reviews.title: A Great Oil
customer_reviews.text: If you're gonna fry your food, this is the oil to use. It has a high smoking point and contains the nutritional benefits of Avocados. I don't want to sound like an infomercial but after discovering this, I'm going to stay away from vegetable and corn oil...for as long as I can anyway. Avocado oil is getting expensive. Already went up $3 since January!
customer_reviews.author: Lee G.

customer_reviews.title: flavorful oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ordered this oil on line. Used to buy it at Marshalls as only one store where we lived carried it. Now that we have moved to a small town in SC there is no store around us that carries it. Once I found it online I will continue to order it from Amazon. The flavor is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: quality 100% pure avocado oil
customer_reviews.text: fast shipment, good quality, nice flavor. 14g FAT per 14g serving, ~100% oil. UNLIKE some brand that sells avocado oil, according to label, that has 14g FAT (ROUNDED UP from 13.5g FAT) per 15g serving (with 1.5g water??? 90% PURE avocado oil??? check their label before buying)!!! I got the other az popular brand for cheaper price, but felt I got a watered-down version. I am switching back to this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fang

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: OMG this stuff is good! I bought it for skin and hair moisturizing, but after cooking with it decided to keep it in the kitchen. For skin and hair, I prefer lighter oils like sweet almond and jojoba. For cooking, this stuff is amazing. It imparts a nice, delicate flavor and smells good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy on the internet

customer_reviews.title: Neutral, High smoke point, and healthy. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Chosen Foods Avocado Oil for a while now. It’s really nice. Neutral to light pleasant flavor. Clean, high smoke point. And a more healthy fat type. So it’s really good. But all I can find at my local groove is the spray version. And I didn’t win a bottle through Sam the Cooking Guy’s billion bottle giveaway. So here we are. It really is good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for high heat.
customer_reviews.text: My go to oil is olive oil but not too long ago I heard that it shouldn't be used for cooking at high temperatures. I am not a big fan of coconut oil so my go to is now Avocado Oil. I am really pleased with it. It doesn't impart a flavor to the food. It is great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: lynnikins

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite cooking oil!
customer_reviews.text: We use Chosen Foods Avocado Oil for pretty much everything - cooking, baking, roasting in the oven, etc. Love that it doesn't add a distinct, noticeable flavor to foods. We prefer glass bottles and always need this larger 1 L size bottle, considering how much and how frequently we use it, but it's no longer carried by any of our local stores. So glad we can get it on Amazon! It arrived quickly, and also packaged in the most secure, cushioned bubble wrap we have ever seen - will order again!
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am convinced this is the best oil for all my cooking. I am using this oil to replace olive oil. It has a very pleasant taste. I love it on salads. It is also great for a stir fry. I recently bought a bottle for my granddaughter. She goes to school where the climate is very dry. She can use it for cooking and as a moisturizer. The bottle is so attractive I leave it on my counter in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Marge V

customer_reviews.title: Love this avocado oil
customer_reviews.text: Chosen Foods is my favorite brand of avocado oil and I was super happy to find it here on Amazon. The oil came quickly and packaged so securely that there was no way this bottle could have been broken in shipment. Avocado oil is the only oil I use for cooking. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the price since this is the first time I have tried using avacado oil, but as advertised it doesn't develop a burned taste when using high heats. I've been using it in my hot oil popcorn popper and it works great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Petter ThorsonTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor, or rather "lack thereof"
customer_reviews.text: This avocado oil is excellent for cooking! I've never used this kind of oil, as olive was my "go to". However, I decided to try it and love the fact that not only can I use it for really HIGH heat, but it does not have a flavor. I got tired of olive oil flavoring my food. And, I know this is the healthiest there is! I use it in salad dressing too, or for frying eggs, or drizzling on vegies. Thank you, Chosen foods!
customer_reviews.author: kkonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Good all around oil for all uses.
customer_reviews.text: It has a high smoking point. It has a neutral flavor that does not interfere with the flavor of tbe food being cooked. I have used this oil for years and it has been very consistent bottle to bottle. Also it is a heart healthy oil.
customer_reviews.author: GeriS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I made lovely rich creamy mayonnaise with it, and it tasted great. Homemade is so much better than store bought, and when you have quality ingredients the experience is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Avocado oils are highly recommended as good fats in our diets, Chosen Foods provides us with it.
customer_reviews.text: I use it in all my cooking; I mostly cook on the top of stove. I only use Chosen brand of 100% avocado oil. I feel confident that I am getting one of the purest and healthiest cooking oils. It may be a little more expensive but it is definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Luck is a lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Avocado Oil
customer_reviews.text: Costco used to have this oil but not anymore. This is an excellent oil. The shipping package was amazing. Very sturdy bubble wrap to protect the glass bottle. It would be very hard to break! I use avocado oil on most of my hot cooking. I like this brand very much!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Bee

customer_reviews.title: My oil for homemade mayonaise and salad dressing plus my frying oil!
customer_reviews.text: I love Chosen brand avacado oil because avacado oil takes the highest temperature of any cooking oils without breaking down. I just like the taste of it in homemade salad dressings and homemade mayonaise. My favorite brand of avacado oil. I buy it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Dozenelk

customer_reviews.title: Avocado oil is the best fry and grill oil . .
customer_reviews.text: blend avocado oil 50-50 with olive oil apply directly to greens for a very good salad oil. nice for making salad dressings too. but primarily the best fry oil for smoke point and health is avocado oil . melt some butter in the heated oil to reduce butter burning and enhance food flavor.
customer_reviews.author: j.brown

customer_reviews.title: Use more than olive oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great avocado oil. Good quality. I use this oil for alot of my cooking because of its light taste and much higher smoke burn than olive oil. I only use olive oil for Italian receipes and certain dressings. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Oneday....

customer_reviews.title: My favorite oil at a great price point
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite avocado oil for cooking and for cold preparation (e.g., my homemade salad dressing). I didn't realize how much bigger this bottle is than the ones available at my local stores. I'll continue buying this product from this seller. The convenience is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hawa Bond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Oil for just about everything
customer_reviews.text: Love this Avocado oil for frying and for salads. It is so fresh tasting and doesn't mask the flavor of whatever you put it on. Very light in texture. More reasonable here on Amazon than in the grocery store too.
customer_reviews.author: preacher lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keto diets
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed using this cooking oil because it was recommended for those on a ketogenic diet (high fat-moderate protein-low carb). It has a good flavor that works well whether you are cooking or just dressing some greens or a salad. It's higher cook-point makes it a great choice for higher-temp cooking, too.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R. Webb

customer_reviews.title: fantastic cooking oil
customer_reviews.text: High smoke point, neutral flavor. It's great to cook with and not alter the taste of what you're cooking. In baking if a recipe calls for vegetable oil, you can sub this in instead as well without noticing any taste or difference in baking. All around a very handy oil to have that won't impact taste
customer_reviews.author: Ian M. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Gives great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of Avacado Oil before. But, I must say, once I used it with making pasta, or browning fish, this oil gives your meal a fantastic flavor. Much better than, or at least different from, olive oil. Definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Good value and tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product at a local retailer and paid almost twice as much. It was half the volume and 8.99. So this is by far a better deal. If you follow the benefits of Avocados they are one of the best foods for reducing cholesterol.
customer_reviews.author: agoshopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand and tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this instead of cooking with olive oil because it can be cooked in higher heat. The size of the bottle is large but has a great design, tastes great, and excellent value for the money. I use it most often on my baked asparagus with garlic and parmesan! YUM!
customer_reviews.author: Firehorse

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2 and got 1
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. In reading the description I found that I would get 2 1 liter bottles for $19.95. We got 1.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I like this! I'm the pickiest person ever but you cannot taste this at all. I use a tbsp in my meal replacement shake to get my fats in. I'm definitely going to keep this in stock!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Collins

customer_reviews.title: Best oil
customer_reviews.text: There wouldn't be anything broken in shipping if everything was packed like this product. The price is good too. The flavor is better than Olive oil too.
customer_reviews.author: Busdriver

customer_reviews.title: An apartment/condo must
customer_reviews.text: A godsend for apartment/condo dwellers who enjoy the culinary arts! I can finally cook at a high heat with oil and not set off my apartment’s fire alarms and avoid turning my shoebox of a home into an underground hookah lounge. Have only used it when pan frying meats and there is no detectable taste... which I think is a great thing! It’s expensive but I like the way it makes me feel like a baller when I splurge for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy substitute for corn oil
customer_reviews.text: As a cancer survivor I have been looking at my diet more closely. I have gotten rid of all the corn and canola oil in my house. I like avocado oil for cooking especially when I make my homemade popcorn. I have used this brand many times and feel like it's a good quality oil.
customer_reviews.author: Rene R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for all USES
customer_reviews.text: Since I discovered avocado oil by chosen foods it has been my number one oil to use for cooking, baking, dressings etc. It has a high heat point for frying. It blends in well for cakes etc. making salad dressings is a breeze and so tasty. The taste does not overpower no manner what genre you use it for. Give it a try and I am sure you will agree.
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR US
customer_reviews.text: What is healthier than avocados??? And the spray can makes cooking everything swell! Found it first in a "gourmet" market but no more so quite happy to find it on Amazon. I have the bottled oil as well. Use it all the time. BONUS: my friend told me it's ZERO point on WW! Everyone's happy.
customer_reviews.author: ARK

customer_reviews.title: Good for cooking
customer_reviews.text: I like its taste, I used in my cooking for high heat. The package is poor, I firstly received it broken and it was a serious miss other than that as an advised...
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Very versible/available at Costco
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It has become my go to oil for cooking. I actually like it better than olive oil. Strongly recommend it. My only comment is after I bought it, I found it at Costco for $10.59. Same bottle. Same size. Same product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product in Super Packaging
customer_reviews.text: This oil has a high smoke point. It adds no flavor to dishes that I cook at the stove, as well as as an ingredient. It and coconut oil are the only ones we use. The bottle is glass and comes in an amazing bubble wrap in the shape of the bottle itself. Very well thought out shipping and amazing product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Learning Alterations

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this product. I have been very satisfied with the quality. Also, it is in a glass bottle and is extremely well packaged and protected. Both times the produce has been received in perfect condition and in a timely manner. I will definitely be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: remarkable packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite avocado oil. It has a very light but flavorful taste. I was so impressed with the packaging for this shipment, and am compelled to write this review and post a photo. You would not believe it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: livin my life

customer_reviews.title: Best all around oil
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive but worth it. No heavy smell or taste. Fries/sautés food beautifully. Provides crispy texture without oil residue. Tried to make mayo with it. Not too good for that as mayo remains thin. Otherwise it is my go-to cooking oil.
customer_reviews.author: Bflash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: With this oil you use a lot less than other oils. It takes high temperatures perfectly. It is not an oil you would want to use on a salad.
customer_reviews.author: Dandy Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Safe Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. It is definitely one of the most versatile oils I have used with its high smoke point (great for stir-frying!), neutral flavor, and nutritional content. If you like Olive oil's nutrition, but want something with a more neutral flavor, this is it. In my case, I ordered several bottles at once. Each was individually wrapped in a bubble-wrap sleeve to protect the bottles during transit. Highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Gobbo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent neutral oil for high heat cooking
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Chosen Avocado oil for years. The bottle is shipped in a heavy bubble tube and has always arrived intact, never leaking. I prefer the larger bottle size so that I dont have to order very often.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Marigold

customer_reviews.title: Healthy oil to sauté , fry and cook food.
customer_reviews.text: I got rid of all soy, corn, and vegetable oil, replace them with Avocado because this oil is doesn't become toxic under certain heat degrees. It has no taste, very healthy for french fries, fried chicken,..and any fried item.
customer_reviews.author: Abdelkrim saihi

customer_reviews.title: New Keto Guy Here!
customer_reviews.text: I switched up to a Keto diet and the experience has been more impressive than I could have imagined. This product is now very integrated in my life. I'm very conscious about good health oils that I'm taking into my body. This one extremely works for me.
customer_reviews.author: John Sharnetsky

customer_reviews.title: High smoke point, mild flavor, great price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this avocado oil. The smoke point is higher than most other oils which lends itself to stove top cooking without fear of burning like olive oil. The mild flavor and rich texture lends itself to raw foods as well, I dress salads and pour the oil over my popcorn without any avocado flavor. Also, compared to many other avocado oils the price simply cannot be beat, 5/5, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell and Taste
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time, I have used Avocado Oil and very excited about it! It has a very good taste and smell, so I’M sure it will be good as it is Amazons first choice! The only problem was, I thought I was ordering two small bottles, which would have been easier to use, as my hands are very bad!
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: The only brand we use.
customer_reviews.text: When we made the switch to avocado oil we tried several brands. This is by far the best, light tasting oil out there. It makes amazing mayo and amazing on salads. I only wish I could buy it by the gallon!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. Better for cooking than olive oil.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Clean, clear, neutral and a great all around oil. Yes, it's a bit expensive, but it's worth it if you do any high heat cooking. Many recipes call for olive oil but it oxidizes under high heat which is unhealthy for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jathpuh's mama

customer_reviews.title: Have used several times and am very happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on date as promised. Have used several times and am very happy with the results. Will definitely purchase again. Less expensive than purchasing from grocery store and a much higher quality than some we've used in past.
customer_reviews.author: CSW

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Made 3 meals and everything turned out fine. I actually like the taste right from the bottle. Tried high heat, baking, and breakfast and I love this. Never used Avocado oil before but will now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Eberly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the shipping package (came bubble wrapped in avocado bubble wrap!) Works great for cooking and for my hair/body.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Good oil
customer_reviews.text: Very little flavor to this oil, and high smoke point make this amazing. I like coconut oil too, but it has a little bit of a sweet flavor.... But not this one!
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Good for you
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the taste of olive oil so I use this wonderful oil. I know it’s a bit expensive but it’s really versatile and good for you too. I use it for everything. It tastes great and can be heated to 500 degrees. Try it you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Chudich

customer_reviews.title: No smell no taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil for my hair. I also use it on my body. This oil is so smooth it has no smell and no taste. It feels good on my scalp and hair and body. I also used it to make my lipgloss. I LOVE IT FOR NOW
customer_reviews.author: Chosen Remnant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Avocado Oil!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is the best! We use it for cooking as well as in our green smoothies to add more fat. This last time I bought 4 bottles and they were shipped right from Chosen Foods and they were expertly and securely packaged, so all 4 bottles arrived in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: Cooks at a high temperature
customer_reviews.text: Great oil, I use it on the Keto diet, but would use it if I wasn’t. I like the fact that it cooks at a high temperature. Makes wonderful salad dressings. The bottle of oil is huge! It came well packed. This is my second order of it.
customer_reviews.author: Connemara

customer_reviews.title: Best oil
customer_reviews.text: We love cooking with avocado oil. Does not burn with high heat, has a good taste. We are vegetarians and like this oil the best. We also like that it comes in a glass bottle. Thanks for great product
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Virgin Olive Oil, but I read an article suggesting the use of Avocado Oil for cooking, and I started a couple of weeks ago. I am very happy with it, and God willing I will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Benny the American

customer_reviews.title: Please switch from canola etc
customer_reviews.text: I just started keto two months ago. This is the best. Helps a lot. Olive oil is great but findkng the real stuff is scary. I have olive oil but this is great for makkng your own mayo. Its so smooth. And cooling in higher heats. Olive oil is for low or very low heat cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand of avocado oil for cooking, I used other companies, but this one is my favorite, highly recommended. I bought it also as a gift for others.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. No taste to interfere with any type of cooking. I bake with it, and every other type of cooking
customer_reviews.author: Sus

customer_reviews.title: Avocado - Nature’s perfect oil!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dipping oil or lightly frying items. If you’re into avocado... try avocado oil - the price for the size of the bottle is a Bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron B. Billie

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product, good clean taste
customer_reviews.text: We began purchasing this Avocado Oil from Sams/Walmart in our search for the best oil from which to make healthy Mayonnaise. Then Sams/Walmart stopped carrying it and we found on Amazon. Great product and we have found it a must to keep in our pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Lynwood Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, it’s delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle! I love it, whether using it to sauté or drizzle on salad or bread.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I eat a keto diet and follow Low Carb with Jennifer. This is the one she recommends!
customer_reviews.author: dpat46

customer_reviews.title: Avocado oil!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent packaging! I am impressed! Also, great product, avocado oil is perfect for high heat cooking. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Light and delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love this avocado oil. Very light and flavorful. Use it for everything in place of olive oil. And their packaging is superb. Never have to worry about loose lid or broken bottle. thank you
customer_reviews.author: pjeaux

customer_reviews.title: Avocado oil is so smooth. And full of good-guy omega-3 fat etc.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried just about every olive oil, no matter which one, no matter how smooth, olive oil always has a bite as I swallow it, when it hits the back of my mouth. Avocado oil is just pure smooth. And this avocado oil is price right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Austin guy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking with this oil. I’m glad I found it. You can cook or fry with this oil. My family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D Cecotti

customer_reviews.title: Organic Avocado Oil
customer_reviews.text: This Avocado oil from Chosen Foods is my family favorite my mother takes a tablespoon every morning and night. It is wonderful on foods and salads. They package it extremely well and deliver on time.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil!
customer_reviews.text: Best oil. I love the avocado oil because it can withstand high temps. I use it all the time in my cast iron pans and its amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cooking oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cooking oil, and it can be used for dipping and salads as well. I would recommend you look around for the best price though, even the dreaded Wal-mart carries it at a way better price than I was able to get it off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good to have around
customer_reviews.text: We use this oil for everything! Eggs and potato’s and veggies!! It doesn’t have a heavy taste and all our food comes out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: HEALTHY OIL WITH A HIGH SMOKE POINT
customer_reviews.text: An excellent, healthy oil with a high smoke point. Great for when you're cooking something where the heat is too high for olive oil. This is my second bottle and I've been very happy with this avocado oil.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tapp

customer_reviews.title: Delightfully delicious :-)
customer_reviews.text: I alternate using it with olive oil, coconut oil & butter for breakfast eggs, bake goods, wilting seasoned spinach/arugula,...wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: annieV

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love avocado oil. I love that I can get it in this large bottle for just a little more than half its size at any local store. Great product. I use it in deep fryer, and to fry hashbrowns and cook eggs, delicious and so much more healthy for you.
customer_reviews.author: PQ

product_meta.title: Chosen Foods 100% Pure Avocado Oil 1 L, Non-GMO, for High-Heat Cooking, Frying, Baking, Homemade Sauces, Dressings and Marinades
feature_bullets: CHOSEN FOODS AVOCADO OIL is pure, delicious, and always made from naturally refined avocados, ripened to perfection in warm, sun-drenched groves.

FOR COOKING, BAKING, DRESSINGS, and MARINADES, avocado oil is the kitchen workhorse. Imbued with a neutral flavor and 500°F smoke point, avocado oil can be used for any purpose, from high-heat sauteing and flame grilling, to dressing mixed greens, grains and pasta salads.
COASTAL CRAFTED FLAVOR made with purpose. We believe in sea, sunshine and simplicity! Try all of our avocado oil-based products inspired by the flavors and lifestyle of the Baja Med.
HEART-HEALTHY, ALL NATURAL, free of gluten, soy and canola oils, plant-based, and certified by the Non-GMO Project.
100% PURE AVOCADO OIL is the star of our story. Join us in creating simple ways of experiencing natural culinary wonder.
